Rime Hauberk

armor (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 233
armor id [armor]: 46 (Rime Hauberk)
protection, body [protbody]: 16
defence [def]: -2
encumbrance [enc]: 2
resist cold [coldres]: +5
coldaura [coldaura]: 1

Requires 10W to forge (W2)

Armor made of interlinked ice crystals, it protects the wearer from cold and surrounds him with a wind of ice and snow. The icy wind can harm both enemies and friends in the vicinity of the wearer.
